text: We should do the work of grabbing the labels of the atlases in the downloaders and expose them uniformely. It would make the life of the users easier.
title: Have a uniform representation of labels for atlases
Have a uniform representation of labels for atlases

text: OK, you mean that labels are not loaded in MSDL. They are loaded in Harvard Oxford.

Return in-memory labels, loaded from the CSV file. The code to load
labels in Harvard Oxford and MSDL are very different.
Perhaps in form of an additional option in `NiftiLabelsMasker` and `NiftiMapsMasker` ?
